<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="FirewallInboundRule">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L18" >}}">interface <b>FirewallInboundRule</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="FirewallInboundRule-portRange">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L25" >}}">property <b>portRange</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>portRange?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The ports on which traffic will be allowed
specified as a string containing a single port, a range (e.g. "8000-9000"),
or "1-65535" to open all ports for a protocol. Required for when protocol is
`tcp` or `udp`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="FirewallInboundRule-protocol">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L30" >}}">property <b>protocol</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>protocol: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The type of traffic to be allowed.
This may be one of "tcp", "udp", or "icmp".

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="FirewallInboundRule-sourceAddresses">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L36" >}}">property <b>sourceAddresses</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">

{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

An array of strings containing the IPv4

inbound traffic will be accepted.

{{% /md %}}
</div>

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="KubernetesClusterNodePoolNode">

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="KubernetesClusterNodePoolNode-name">

</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>name?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

A name for the Kubernetes cluster.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="KubernetesClusterNodePoolNode-status">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L145" >}}">property <b>status</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>status?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

A string indicating the current status of the cluster. Potential values include running, provisioning, and errored.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="KubernetesClusterNodePoolNode-updatedAt">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L155" >}}">property <b>updatedAt</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>updatedAt?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The date and time when the Kubernetes cluster was last updated.
* `kube_config.0` - A representation of the Kubernetes cluster's kubeconfig with the following attributes:
- `rawConfig` - The full contents of the Kubernetes cluster's kubeconfig file.
- `host` - The URL of the API server on the Kubernetes master node.
- `clientKey` - The base64 encoded private key used by clients to access the cluster.
- `clientCertificate` - The base64 encoded public certificate used by clients to access the cluster.
- `clusterCaCertificate` - The base64 encoded public certificate for the cluster's certificate authority.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
</div>

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="LoadBalancerForwardingRule">

<div class="pdoc-module-contents">

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerForwardingRule-entryPort">

<div class="pdoc-member-contents">

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerForwardingRule-entryProtocol">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L184" >}}">property <b>entryProtocol</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>entryProtocol: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The protocol used for traffic to the Load Balancer. The possible values are: `http`, `https`, `http2` or `tcp`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerForwardingRule-targetPort">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L188" >}}">property <b>targetPort</b></a>

{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

An integer representing the port on the backend Droplets to which the Load Balancer will send traffic.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerForwardingRule-targetProtocol">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L192" >}}">property <b>targetProtocol</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}

{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The protocol used for traffic from the Load Balancer to the backend Droplets. The possible values are: `http`, `https`, `http2` or `tcp`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerForwardingRule-tlsPassthrough">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L196" >}}">property <b>tlsPassthrough</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}

{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

A boolean value indicating whether SSL encrypted traffic will be passed through to the backend Droplets. The default value is `false`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
</div>
<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L199" >}}">interface <b>LoadBalancerHealthcheck</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-checkIntervalSeconds">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L203" >}}">property <b>checkIntervalSeconds</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>checkIntervalSeconds?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The number of seconds between between two consecutive health checks. If not specified, the default value is `10`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-healthyThreshold">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L207" >}}">property <b>healthyThreshold</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>healthyThreshold?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The number of times a health check must pass for a backend Droplet to be marked "healthy" and be re-added to the pool. If not specified, the default value is `5`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-path">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L211" >}}">property <b>path</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>path?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The path on the backend Droplets to which the Load Balancer instance will send a request.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-port">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L215" >}}">property <b>port</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>port: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

An integer representing the port on the backend Droplets on which the health check will attempt a connection.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-protocol">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L219" >}}">property <b>protocol</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>protocol: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The protocol used for health checks sent to the backend Droplets. The possible values are `http` or `tcp`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-responseTimeoutSeconds">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L223" >}}">property <b>responseTimeoutSeconds</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>responseTimeoutSeconds?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The number of seconds the Load Balancer instance will wait for a response until marking a health check as failed. If not specified, the default value is `5`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerHealthcheck-unhealthyThreshold">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L227" >}}">property <b>unhealthyThreshold</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>unhealthyThreshold?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The number of times a health check must fail for a backend Droplet to be marked "unhealthy" and be removed from the pool. If not specified, the default value is `3`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
</div>
<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="LoadBalancerStickySessions">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L230" >}}">interface <b>LoadBalancerStickySessions</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerStickySessions-cookieName">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L234" >}}">property <b>cookieName</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>cookieName?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The name to be used for the cookie sent to the client. This attribute is required when using `cookies` for the sticky sessions type.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerStickySessions-cookieTtlSeconds">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L238" >}}">property <b>cookieTtlSeconds</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>cookieTtlSeconds?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

The number of seconds until the cookie set by the Load Balancer expires. This attribute is required when using `cookies` for the sticky sessions type.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerStickySessions-type">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="digitalocean" path="types/input.ts#L242" >}}">property <b>type</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
{{< md-disable >}}
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>type?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{< /md-disable >}}
{{% md %}}

An attribute indicating how and if requests from a client will be persistently served by the same backend Droplet. The possible values are `cookies` or `none`. If not specified, the default value is `none`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
</div>
